instructions: Tap Settings on your Home screen. Tap your initials to access your Apple ID account. Tap iCloud to access your iCloud settings. If iCloud Backup is off, tap it to turn it on. If it's already on, proceed to step 8. Toggle on iCloud Backup . You'll be notified this will prevent your iPhone from automatically syncing with iTunes, tap OK . Wait for iCloud Backup to turn on. Tap Back Up Now to start the backup process. Wait for the backup to complete. Once complete, the Last Backup time will change from "Never" to the current date and time.
